title: Gin no Guardian (The Silver Guardian)
synopsis: High school student and gamer Suigin Riku attends the prestigious Shinryou Private Academy, a school for the elite and the children of the wealthy. But rich or wealthy are not words that describe Suigin; in fact, he is dirt poor and must work many part time jobs to pay for his tuition. During one such job, he dives into a pool to save his pet cat, fully aware that he cannot swim. Luckily, he is saved by Rei Riku, the beautiful and popular daughter of a game developer, and he falls in love with her.
characters: ['Lu, Shui Yin', 'Lu, Lian', 'Fei, Bi', 'Hua, Ling', 'L', 'Twin Star', 'Collector', 'Mikan', 'Littrette', 'Lao, Long']
